Interface IEnquiryManagement

public interface IEnquiryManagement
Interface for managing enquiry operations in the BTO Management System.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    createEnquiry(Applicant applicant, Project project, String enquiryText)
    Creates a new enquiry.
    boolean
    deleteEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
    Deletes an enquiry.
    List<Enquiry>
    getAllEnquiries()
    Gets a list of all enquiries.
    List<Enquiry>
    getEnquiriesByApplicant(Applicant applicant)
    Gets a list of enquiries by applicant.
    List<Enquiry>
    getEnquiriesByProject(Project project)
    Gets a list of enquiries by project.
    List<Enquiry>
    getEnquiriesByStatus(boolean answered)
    Gets a list of enquiries by status (answered/unanswered).
    boolean
    replyToEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry, String replyText, String responderNric)
    Replies to an enquiry.
    boolean
    updateEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry, String newEnquiryText)
    Updates an existing enquiry.

  • Method Details

    • createEnquiry

      boolean createEnquiry(Applicant applicant, Project project, String enquiryText)
      Creates a new enquiry.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant submitting the enquiry
      project - The project the enquiry is about
      enquiryText - The text of the enquiry
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry was successfully created, false otherwise

    • updateEnquiry

      boolean updateEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry, String newEnquiryText)
      Updates an existing enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - The enquiry to update
      newEnquiryText - The new text for the enquiry
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry was successfully updated, false otherwise

    • deleteEnquiry

      boolean deleteEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Deletes an enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - The enquiry to delete
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • replyToEnquiry

      boolean replyToEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry, String replyText, String responderNric)
      Replies to an enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - The enquiry to reply to
      replyText - The text of the reply
      responderNric - The NRIC of the person responding to the enquiry
      Returns:
      true if the reply was successfully added, false otherwise

    • getEnquiriesByApplicant

      List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByApplicant(Applicant applicant)
      Gets a list of enquiries by applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant who submitted the enquiries
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries submitted by the specified applicant

    • getEnquiriesByProject

      List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByProject(Project project)
      Gets a list of enquiries by project.
      Parameters:
      project - The project the enquiries are about
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries about the specified project

    • getAllEnquiries

      List<Enquiry> getAllEnquiries()
      Gets a list of all enquiries.
      Returns:
      A list of all enquiries in the system

    • getEnquiriesByStatus

      List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByStatus(boolean answered)
      Gets a list of enquiries by status (answered/unanswered).
      Parameters:
      answered - true to get answered enquiries, false to get unanswered enquiries
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries filtered by answered status
